    I work at Hohai University as an assistant professor now in Nanjing.

    I graduated from Northwestern Polytechnical University with a bachelor‚Äôs degree, from Universit√© de Technologie de Belfort-Montb√©liard (France) with a master‚Äôs degree, and a Ph.D in Computer Science from Universit√© d‚ÄôAngers, France, supervised by Jin-Kao Hao.

    My research interest includes large-scale combinatorial optimization and intelligent optimization algorithms, which are mainly applied in vehicle routing, chip resource scheduling, graph layout, etc. The main published papers appear in EJOR, ESWA, KBS and EAAI. I have received several research grants from National Science Foundation of China (NSFC) and Ministry of Education of the People‚Äôs Republic of China.
